mapper.select: select chatno, isread, cast(date as date) as date, cast(date as time) as time, msg, c.muno, c.mno, who, mu.mno as musino, mu.name as musiname, musi.nick as musinick, mu.path as musiphoto, m.mno as gmno, m.name as gmname, m.path as gmphoto from chat c inner join memb mu on c.muno=mu.mno inner join musi on mu.mno=musi.muno inner join memb m on c.mno=m.mno where c.mno=#{mno} and c.muno=#{muno} order by date asc
